subject: probability
title: Geometric Distribution Theorem
contentHtml: The geometric distribution is a discrete probability distribution that models the number of trials until the first success in a series of independent and identically distributed Bernoulli trials.
intuition: The geometric distribution is memoryless, meaning that the probability of success in the next trial only depends on the current state and not on the number of previous failures.
realWorldApplications: Waiting time analysis in queuing systems

subject: probability
title: Geometric Distribution
contentHtml: The geometric distribution represents the waiting time until a first success in a sequence of independent and identically distributed Bernoulli trials.
name: Geometric Distribution" },
intuition: The geometric distribution is memoryless, meaning that the probability of a success does not depend on previous failures. This property makes it useful in modeling phenomena where the waiting time until an event occurs is independent of past events.
realWorldApplications: This distribution is used in queuing theory to model the time until a customer arrives at a service station.
